shelter.name: First Baptist Church
shelter.info: Tuesday nights only (does not operate from June to August). Tickets given out at 6:30pm. No alcohol/drug use on site. Curfew 9.30pm.

shelter.name: First United Church
shelter.info: Wheelchair accessible, carts and pets allowed.

shelter.name: Lookout Al Mitchell Place Shelter
shelter.info: Wheelchair accessible. Pets allowed. Laundry facilities. Medication/money administration.

shelter.name: Lookout Yukon Shelter
shelter.info: Wheelchair accessible. Pets allowed. Laundry facilities. Medication/money administration.Harm reduction. No alcohol/drugs on site, but safe injection room available.
